verses.verse: <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> he <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> into <S%H7875>lime:<s%>

But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H7152>Kirioth:<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with <S%H7588>tumult,<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> and with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet:<s%>

And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H8199>judge<s%> from the <S%H7130>middle<s%> thereof, and will <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof with him, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> they have <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H2706>commandments,<s%> and their <S%H3576>lies<s%> caused them to <S%H8582>err,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H834>which<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H1980>walked:<s%>
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> they <S%H4376>sold<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H34>poor<s%> for a pair of <S%H5275>shoes;<s%>

That <S%H7602>pant<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6035>meek:<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H2>father<s%> will <S%H3212>go<s%> in to the same <S%H5291>maid,<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name:<s%>

And they <S%H5186>lay<s%> themselves down on <S%H899>clothes<s%> laid to <S%H2254>pledge<s%> by <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and they <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of the <S%H6064>condemned<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>god.<s%>

Yet <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> I the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1363>height<s%> was like the <S%H1363>height<s%> of the <S%H730>cedars,<s%> and he was <S%H2634>strong<s%> as the <S%H437>oaks;<s%> yet I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> from <S%H4605>above,<s%> and his <S%H8328>roots<s%> from <S%H8478>beneath.<s%>

Also I <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite.<s%>

And I <S%H6965>raised<s%> up of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and of your <S%H970>young<s%> men for <S%H5139>Nazarites.<s%> Is it not <S%H637>even<s%> <S%H2063>thus,<s%> O you <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
But you gave the <S%H5139>Nazarites<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink;<s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> not.
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5781>pressed<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> you, as a <S%H5699>cart<s%> is <S%H5781>pressed<s%> that is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5995>sheaves.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H4498>flight<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H7031>swift,<s%> and the <S%H2389>strong<s%> shall not <S%H553>strengthen<s%> his <S%H3581>force,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>himself:<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall he <S%H5975>stand<s%> that <S%H8610>handles<s%> the <S%H7198>bow;<s%> and he that is <S%H7031>swift<s%> of <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall not <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>himself:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he that <S%H7392>rides<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>himself.<s%>
And he that is <S%H533>courageous<s%> <S%H3820><s%> among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> away <S%H6174>naked<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
